description: This Norfolk village is located near Norwich in the southern part of the county. This short walk takes you through the Poringland Community Wood which is located on the western side of the village. Also to the west you can pick up the Shotesham Walk and follow the Boudicca Way north to visit the Venta Icenorum Roman town at Caistor St Edmund. Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Poringland. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.
